# 深度学习教程 0.1（LISA 实验室）20170304

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shendu-xuexi-jiaocheng-0-1-lisa-shiyanshi-20170304
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shendu-xuexi-jiaocheng-0-1-lisa-shiyanshi-20170304
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shendu-xuexi-jiaocheng-0-1-lisa-shiyanshi-20170304
shendu-xuexi-jiaocheng-0-1-lisa-shiyanshi-20170304 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shendu-xuexi-jiaocheng-0-1-lisa-shiyanshi-erlingyiqilingsanlingsi
shendu-xuexi-jiaocheng-0-1-lisa-shiyanshi-erlingyiqilingsanlingsi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
